title: Change global registration invite code to "dagger"

requirements.text: Update the backend global registration invite code so that `acceptInvite` only accepts the invite code "dagger" (replacing the current value), enabling users to register and enter the app with that code.

quotes: I canâ€™t enter the app without an invite can you make the reservation vote code dagger

acceptanceCriteria: In `backend/main.mo`, the `globalInviteCode` constant is set to "dagger".
Calling `acceptInvite(username, "dagger")` succeeds when capacity is not exceeded and the username is unique.
Calling `acceptInvite(username, <any other code>)` traps with an invalid invite code error (unchanged behavior).

constraints: Respect the single-actor backend architecture; implement changes only in `backend/main.mo`.
Do not modify any files under `frontend/src/components/ui` or other immutable frontend paths.
nonGoals: Do not change squad (group) invite code generation or rotation behavior.
Do not change the 45-user registration cap or other onboarding steps (disclaimer/guidelines acceptance).
